string.value: You should go see the Thief Job Instructor, since Ryden has indicated that he has received a secret letter from the Dark Lord and is investigating the Dual Blades. You must be careful not to reveal the contents of that letter.

The Thief Job Instructor says that people with ulterior motives seem to have entered Kerning City disguised as thieves. He says that a person standing in front of the Jazz Bar appears really suspicious and asks that you investigate his motives. \r\nThe suspicious person standing in front of the Jazz Bar... Does he mean Ryden?

The Thief Job Instructor said that people with ulterior motives seem to have entered Kerning City disguised as thieves. He said that a person standing in front of the Jazz Bar was really suspicious and asked that you investigate his motives. \r\nRyden, the suspicious person standing in front of the Jazz Bar, was taken aback but devised a plan that will trick the Thief Job Instructor.

string.name: summary
string.value: The Thief Job Instructor is suspicious of #bRyden#k. Go see #bRyden#k in Kerning City.

What brings you here? You don't seem ready to take the job advancement test.\r\n#L0##bI just stopped by because I noticed you from afar while I was headed to Perion. I heard a lot about you from the Dark Lord. He says that you've been very busy these days, and he was wondering if there is any way I can assist you.#l\n#k
The Dark Lord? So, you know about...?\r\n#L0##bYes, I know about it. It's supposedly top secret, but it's not hard to guess in light of the incidents that have been occurring recently.#l\n#k

I can see that you are very bright. Very well, it's true. This has been a huge thorn in my flesh. I think they are more deeply involved than we realize. I need to find out who they are and what their plans are. Do you think you could help me?

There is no doubt that they are already active inside Kerning City. They've been doing a good job trying to keep hidden, but they can't fool me. In fact, I have spotted someone who is very suspicious. You know that guy standing in front of the Jazz Bar, watching people all day long? It's him...
You don't know who I'm talking about? It's the guy wearing the reed hat. From what I can gather, his name is #bRyden#k. I need you to find out what it is that he's trying to hide.
If you spoke with the Dark Lord, then you'd know the importance of this mission.
So, what's the deal? Did you talk to him?\r\n#L0##bI think he has his eyes on you. He seems to feel that you are suspicious.#l\n#k
Oh, really? I guess he's not as dumb as he looks. So, he told you to come find out about me? In that case, let's give him an answer.

You don't know who I'm talking about? It's the guy who wears the reed hat and stands in front of the Jazz Bar. From what I can gather, his name is #bRyden#k. His eyes look as if he is hiding something...
